News

30 March 2020
Our survey about software-defined storage was accepted in ACM CSUR

17 November 2019
Ricardo Macedo earned a PhD grant from Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia!

10 October 2019
We have published two new papers at the DRSS workshop colocated with SRDS’19!

We are part of the High-Assurance Software Laboratory, one of the integrated R&D centres of INESC TEC and a subunit of University of Minho.
